adept.common

Class DocumentEventArgument.Provenance

  • java.lang.Object
    • adept.common.DocumentEventArgument.Provenance
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Enclosing class:
    DocumentEventArgument

    public static final class DocumentEventArgument.Provenance
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Represents the source of an event argument. It could come from an EventMention, or it could have been predicted in isolation. This class reflects that uncertainty. This class is locally immutable.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • fromStandaloneEventMentionArgument

      • fromArgumentOfEventMention

        public static DocumentEventArgument.Provenance fromArgumentOfEventMention(EventMention em,
                                                                          EventMentionArgument arg)
        Creates a Provenance from an argument attached to an event mention. If arg is not an argument of em, an IllegalArgumentException will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        em - May not be null.
        arg - Must be an argument of em (and therefore cannot be null).
        Returns:
        the new Provenance

      • getEventMention

        public com.google.common.base.Optional<EventMention> getEventMention()
        Gets the event mention this argument is connected to, if available. If present, will contain getEventMentionArgument().
        Returns:
        if present, the event mention.

      • getEventMentionArgument

        public EventMentionArgument getEventMentionArgument()
        Returns:
        Will never be null.
